title: Forms
description: A form builder that allows users to create and share custom forms. Allows users to share and view their statistics from their results.

title: Markdown LSP Server
description: A Language Server Protocol (LSP) implementation for Markdown, written in Rust, providing a customized flow for taking zettelkasten style notes.

title: Portfolio
description: The source code for my personal portfolio, built with Astro.

title: Dotfiles
description: My PDE (Personal Development Environment). Blazing FAST IN THE TERMINAL!

title: Quanty
description: An all-in-one Discord bot designed to elevate server management and community engagement with a rich suite of customizable features and commands.

title: Meka
description: A ecommerce platform for mechanical keyboard enthusiasts to explore new builds, track their collections, and share creations with others.
